## Goal

Track closure of an audit as claim-by-claim receipts.

## Required Closure Checklist

- [ ] Claim-by-claim receipts table completed
- [ ] Unresolved claims list completed (or explicitly none)

## Claim-by-Claim Receipts

| Claim ID | Receipt Link(s) | Evidence Summary |
| --- | --- | --- |
| C-001 |  |  |

## Unresolved Claims

- [ ] None
- [ ] C-___: <blocked claim>, reason, owner, and next action
